item.text: My brothers and sisters, do not show prejudice if you possess faith in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="435" class="">someone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1525" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4864" class="">assembly</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5554">wearing a gold ring</st> and <st data-num="2986" class="">fine</st> <st data-num="2066" class="">clothing</st>, <st data-num="1161">and</st> a <st data-num="4434">poor person</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enters</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4508" class="">filthy</st> <st data-num="2066" class="">clothes</st>,

do you <st data-num="1914">pay attention</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the one who is <st data-num="2986" class="">finely</st> <st data-num="5409 2066">dressed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st>,<n id="1" /> “You <st data-num="2521" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> in a <st data-num="2573">good place</st>,”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="4434">poor person</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="2476">stand over</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>,” <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> “<st data-num="2521">Sit on</st> the <st data-num="5286" class="">floor</st>”?<n id="3" />

If so, have you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1252">made distinctions</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="2923" class="">judges</st> with <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1261" class="">motives</st>?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="191" class="">Listen</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>!<n id="1" /> Did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1586" class="">choose</st> the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st> in the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> to be <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2818" class="">heirs</st> of the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1861" class="">promised</st> to those who <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="818" class="">dishonored</st> the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>!<n id="1" /> Are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st> <st data-num="2616" class="">oppressing</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1670" class="">dragging</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2922" class="">courts</st>?

Do <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="987" class="">blaspheme</st> the <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the one <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1941" class="">belong</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st>?<n id="1" />
But if you fulfill the royal law as expressed in this scripture, “You shall love your neighbor as yourself,” you are doing well.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="4380">show prejudice</st>, you are <st data-num="2038" class="">committing</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> and are <st data-num="1651" class="">convicted</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="3848" class="">violators</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the one <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">obeys</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4417" class="">fails</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one point</st> has <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="1777" class="">guilty</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of it.<n id="2" />
For he who said, “Do not commit adultery,” also said, “Do not murder.” Now if you do not commit adultery but do commit murder, you have become a violator of the law.

<st data-num="2980" class="">Speak</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">act</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> those who <st data-num="3195" class="">will</st> be <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> a <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> that <st data-num="1657">gives freedom</st>.<n id="1" />
For judgment is merciless for the one who has shown no mercy. But mercy triumphs over judgment.
What good is it, my brothers and sisters, if someone claims to have faith but does not have works? Can this kind of faith save him?

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> a <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sister</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5225" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1131">poorly clothed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3007" class="">lacks</st> <st data-num="2184" class="">daily</st> <st data-num="5160" class="">food</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3004">says</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5217">Go</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>, <st data-num="2328">keep warm</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5526">eat well</st>,” <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> you do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> what the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="2006" class="">needs</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3786" class="">good</st> is it?

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> it does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> being <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">itself</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> will <st data-num="3004">say</st>, “You <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">and I</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st>.”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1166" class="">Show</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> <st data-num="2504">and I</st> will <st data-num="1166" class="">show</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st>.
You believe that God is one; well and good. Even the demons believe that—and tremble with fear.
But would you like evidence, you empty fellow, that faith without works is useless?

Was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> when he <st data-num="399" class="">offered</st> <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st>?

You <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> his <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> was <st data-num="4903">working together</st> with <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> was <st data-num="5048" class="">perfected</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st>.
And the scripture was fulfilled that says, “Now Abraham believed God and it was counted to him for righteousness,” and he was called God’s friend.

You <st data-num="3708" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> is <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="3441">alone</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3668" class="">similarly</st>, was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4460" class="">Rahab</st> the <st data-num="4204" class="">prostitute</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> when she <st data-num="5264" class="">welcomed</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">messengers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">sent</st> them <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st> by <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st>?
For just as the body without the spirit is dead, so also faith without works is dead.
